text: @realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC Thank you @RoyCooperNC for keeping us safe from the lunatic!! We in the Great State of NC are thankful we have a Governor like you who has been able to find a balance!! #DumpTrump2020 #COVIDー19 #TrumpLies #coronavirus
